STYLE_LINEEDIT: QLineEdit        {background-color:#E1EDB9; border:1px solid #A59D95; border-radius:4px;} QLineEdit:disabled      {background-color:#EFEBE7;}                QLineEdit:focus      {border:1px solid #99173C;}
STYLE_L_TEXTEDIT: QTextEdit      {background-color:#E1EDB9; border:1px solid #A59D95; border-radius:4px;} QTextEdit:disabled      {color:#555152; background-color:#EFEBE7;} QTextEdit:focus      {border:1px solid #99173C;}
STYLE_R_TEXTEDIT: QPlainTextEdit {background-color:#E1EDB9; border:1px solid #A59D95; border-radius:4px;} QPlainTextEdit:disabled {color:#555152; background-color:#EFEBE7;} QPlainTextEdit:focus {border:1px solid #99173C;}
